text:
What happens when deep tech meets deep industry? 🤔

You get real results, powered by people who’ve built #SmartFactories and scaled real-time #Data systems across the globe.

Meet the experts behind the transformation:
🔹 Steve van den Berg, CrateDB – Architect of global data platforms
🔹 Sivakumar Muthusamy, Tech Mahindra – Leader of Azure-powered Industry 4.0 solutions
🔹 Chandrasekar Velayudam, Tech Mahindra – Veteran of IIoT, AI, and industrial innovation

From predictive maintenance to scalable data intelligence, hear directly from the leaders shaping next-gen #manufacturing strategies.

📅 July 22 | 16:00 CEST

📌 Ask your questions LIVE. See the vision in action.

📲 Register Now: https://t.co/dkzvCrh7pu

#ScaleAtSpeed #DigitalManufacturing #IndustrialAI #SmartFactorySolutions #Webinar #IoT #AI

text:
In a data-driven world, insights are significant. Tech Mahindra’s Navixus Analytics CoE empowers businesses to leverage advanced analytics, turning raw data into actionable insights that drive real results.

From predictive #analytics to #AI-powered decision-making, Navixus is redefining how companies understand and harness data for a competitive edge.

Discover how Navixus™ Analytics CoE is shaping a smarter, more informed future. Dive into a new era of analytics-led transformation and unleash your company’s potential: https://t.co/NGV3MGAFmK
